title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         The Visitor Barn Bookstore is opened daily from 9 a.m. to 3:45 p.m. NPS Photo.  Eastern National operates the Oxon Cove Park Bookstore. A wide variety of educational mechandise can be purchased here during your visit to the park. Many of the items for sale in the bookstore are geared towards our younger visitors. A percentage of your purchase amount is returned to the park for development of interpretive programs.
